long_desc.thetext:
In Opera 9.6, the demos don't load, meaning the actual demo app doesn't load (the Page is loaded ok, so the text can be seen correctly). This is both in source and build version. There is one exception: the Drag&Drop demo always loads ok. The I18N and the HTMLArea demo would load occasionally, but unreliably.
In the error console there is not always an error logged. If it shows, it is something like this in the source version:
JavaScript - file://localhost/home/thron7/workspace/qooxdoo.trunk/application/showcase/source/index.html Event thread: readystatechange Error: name: TypeError message: Statement on line 69: Type mismatch (usually non-object value supplied where object required) Backtrace: Line 69 of linked script file://localhost/home/thron7/workspace/qooxdoo.trunk/application/showcase/source/class/showcase/page/table/Content.js var table = new qx.ui.table.Table(tableModel, custom); ...
and in the build version:
JavaScript - file://localhost/home/thron7/workspace/qooxdoo.trunk/application/showcase/build/index.html Event thread: readystatechange Error: name: TypeError message: Statement on line 100: Cannot convert undefined or null to Object Backtrace: Line 100 of linked script file://localhost/home/thron7/workspace/qooxdoo.trunk/application/showcase/build/script/showcase.js if (dataMap["resources"]){ ...

I've fixed the "isTabable" method to always return boolean values in r21150.
Still need to look at the focus issue.
Please ignore the last comment. It was the wrong bug :-(
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 3221 ***
